'''Claire Sullivan''' is the late wife of [[Robert Sullivan]].

==History==
On her birthday, Claire was in an accident while driving. Her husband was among the responders, along with his friend, [[Lucas Ripley]]. They started CPR when they found she had no pulse and then they got her into an ambulance to take her to the hospital. Ripley decided to use amiodarone with the hopes that it would buy her some time, a call which Sullivan objected to because she was allergic to iodine. The amiodarone didn't work and Claire died.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
She was married to [[Robert Sullivan]] until her death. Their first date was to a roller rink. ''("[[Crash and Burn]]")''

==Notes and Trivia==
*Her birthday is the same as [[Dean Miller|Dean Miller's]].
*She was allergic to iodine.
*She liked to roller skate.<ref>[[Crash and Burn]], 2x08 (S19)</ref>
